title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.9 - Description to be furnished
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.9 - Description to be furnished

State Regulations

The corporation shall respond to a written request reasonably
describing the records sought within five business days of receipt thereof. Whenever possible, a person requesting records should supply information
regarding dates and file designations or other information helpful in
describing the records sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
